wikitext.*:
{{snums}}
'''toloth''' is the number eight (8, VIII) in [[Sindarin]] and perhaps [[Telerin]].
<ref>{{VT|48}}</ref>

In [[Noldorin]], the precursor of Sindarin, "eight" is '''''toloth'''''.  The word derives from [[Sundocarme|root]] TOL (-OTH/OT).<ref name="TOL">{{LR|Etymologies}}, '''TOL'''</ref>

==See also==
*''[[tolodya]]''

==Cognate==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[tolto]]''<ref name="TOL"/>

==Other versions==
Tolkien was uncertain about the last consonant of the stem.<ref>{{VT|47}} p.31-32</ref>
